items.title: Cybersecurity startup Deep Algorithm raises Rs 10.8 crore from Unicorn India Ventures
items.summary: Cybersecurity startup Deep Algorithm raises Rs 10.8 crore from Unicorn India Ventures to scale engineering and threat intelligence teams, accelerate go-to-market activities in India and Southeast Asia, and expand integrations with key enterprise platforms.

items.title: Meta Patches AI Security Flaw That Could Leak Your Private Chatbot Prompts
items.summary: Meta has fixed a security flaw in its AI that could leak users' private chatbot prompts, after it was discovered by a cybersecurity expert. The vulnerability was disclosed on December 26, 2024, and fixed on January 24, 2025.

items.summary: Examining mushrooms under microscopes can help engineers design stronger materials by studying their microscopic building blocks, hyphae.
